metadata.title: CVE-2024-42299 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:fs/ntfs3: Update log->page_{mask,bits} if log->page_size changedIf an NTFS file system is mounted to another system with differentPAGE_SIZE from the original system, log->page_size will change inlog_replay(), but log->page_{mask,bits} don't change correspondingly.This will cause a panic because "u32 bytes = log->page_size - page_off"will get a negative value in the later read_log_page().

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.8.0-50.51').
